name: resident who drinks water
test_code:
verify do
  labeled "resident who drinks water" do
    expected = "Norwegian"
    actual = drinksWater
    label "expected" expected
    label "actual" actual
    ensureEqual expected actual

name: resident who owns zebra
test_code:
verify do
  labeled "resident who owns zebra" do
    expected = "Japanese"
    actual = ownsZebra
    label "expected" expected
    label "actual" actual
    ensureEqual expected actual
